title: I've made this login screen to celebrate league's 10th anniversary

embed.description: Pre-renders and VODS fully available in the link below (FREE*): https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1mLM12fGNTiRSzec-rIQ-5V-5lubyFRSR?usp=sharing Wallpaper Engine: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1888307139 Discord: https://discord.gg/UQwQ6GF Twitter : https://twitter.com/CJXandeRR Artstation : https://www.artstation.com/cjxander Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/cjxanderrr/ Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/cjxanderr Wallpaper Engine : https://steamcommunity.com/id/CJXander Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/RefractArt/ *Photoshop Phase vods are hosted on twitch which require subscription, the after effects vods are completely free along with the pre-renders

body: Bringing some nostalgia back from Season 2

replies.body: Argh, the music is pure nostalgic. Too bad they do away that theme nowadays.
Whoa, this is next-level amazing.  Thank you so much for contributing your talents to our 10 year anniversary celebration!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Lutzburg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ah09jlqB,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-10-15T22:17:26.735+0000)
>
> Whoa, this is next-level amazing.  Thank you so much for contributing your talents to our 10 year anniversary celebration!

Thanks 

{{sticker:sg-lux}}
That right there is what I call talent.

even when i wasnt here before season 6. the best part is that you made it with the old champs instead of the newer ones like xayah/rakan, which really hits the nostalgia, which is odd because i wasnt here before season 6
Man I wish I could use photoshop to maybe a 1/100th of his talent
I miss when riot would actually do login screens

Wasnt even here pre season 5 and this feels nostalgic 

Well done its amazing
